verses.name: Mark 10:49
verses.text: And Jesus stood still, and commanded him to be called. And they call the blind man, saying unto him, Be of good comfort, rise; he calleth thee.

verses.name: Mark 10:50
verses.text: And he, casting away his garment, rose, and came to Jesus.

verses.name: Mark 10:51
verses.text: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.

verses.name: Mark 10:52
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Go thy way; thy faith hath made thee whole. And immediately he received his sight, and followed Jesus in the way.
